item.title: Install the Vim 8.0 and YouCompleteMe with Make on CentOS 7.4
item.description: As a vimmer, I want to complete and install the Vim 7.4.1578+ at ~/.local , so than I can use the YouCompleteMe plugin on CentOS 7.4. â–² The Vim 8.0.1522 on CentOS 7.4.1611. Install the Vim 8.0 with Make1. Install the necessary package. [ jonny@centos7 ~ ] $ sudo yum install gcc-c++ ncurses-devel python-devel 2. Get the source code of Vim. [ jonny@centos7 ~ ] $ git clone https://github.com/vim/vim.git 3.
